name: Crossfire (itch) (Nolski)
description:
This is short rhythm game built in OpenFrameworks using C++ made by Nolan Sadowski.

There are 3 different health bars to keep track of: Red, Blue, and Yellow.

          Red - This is your health. It will decrease when you are playing in blue mode.

          Blue - This is also your health. It will decrease when you are playing in red mode.

          Yellow - This is the boss’s health. Intersect the red and blue flames where the target spawns to try to knock this health bar down to 0 before time runs out!

The in-game controls are very simple, one button is all you need!

         Switch Button - Mouse Click
